posts.post_content:
Posted By: T206Collector
I'm particularly interested in signed T206 cards of poses that I don't have, but I'm interested in any pre-1920 signed baseball cards.

My galleries and wishlists are on my website (click link below).  If you've got any I don't have, please send me an email:  SignedT206@gmail.com

Thanks!

[url]http://www.t206collector.com[/url]
